steps.name: user should navigate to the login page
Enter the url as "https://coalmandi.rokkun.dev/"
Verify that the customer is navigated to the customer website
Enter the email address as "sandeep+ijs@rokkun.io" and password as "Sandeep@123"
Clicks on the login button
customer click on create business profile button
customer click on image upload icon
customer enter remember As into textfield
customer enter GST number into textfield
customer click on verify GST button
customer enter city into textfield
customer enter state into textfield
customer select a option from ownership dropdown
scroll the page upto to the contact field
customer select a option from industry dropdown
customer select a option from product to Trade dropdown

customer enter customer person name into textfield

user click on add sub business unit button

verify the GST number
customer verify the business name
customer enter city into textfield
customer enter state into textfield
scroll the page upto the product to trade
customer enter sub unit address into textfield

customer enter designation into textfield

customer click on save button
verify the additional sub unit business profile created
the user uploads an authorization letter and submits the form
the authorization letter success confirmation message should be displayed
the user uploads an PAN card and submits the form
the PAN card success confirmation message should be displayed
the user uploads an GST certificate and submits the form
the GST certificate success confirmation message should be displayed
the user submits the form with valid bank details and a cancelled cheque
the form should be submitted successfully
the user submits the form with valid Udyam certificate details and Upload Udyam Certificate file
the form should be submitted successfully
the user submits the form with valid IEC certificate details and Upload IEC certificate file
the form should be submitted successfully
the user submits the form with valid D&B numberer details and Upload D&B number file
the form should be submitted successfully
customer click on save & proceed button
the user redirected to review & submit page
customer select the confirm info correctness and accept terms checkbox
customer click on submit for verification button
verify the review button page
user click on profile icon
user click on logout button
verify the login page is displayed
close the application
